code_value: Questions 1~2 Your friend, Fiona, has won the first prize in the English speech contest. Ask her two questions about it.</br> Questions 3~4 Mike is a tourist from Australia. He spent one day in the home of a Shanghainese. Ask him two questions about that day.
Questions 1~2 Your friend, Fiona, has won the first prize in the English speech contest. Ask her two questions about it.
Questions 3~4 Mike is a tourist from Australia. He spent one day in the home of a Shanghainese. Ask him two questions about that day.
